description: "Map of the Mahakam River in Borneo, based on an expedition by the Dutch explorer Dr. Anton Nieuwenhuis in the late 19th century. An inset map shows the upper reaches of the river at twice the scale of the main map."
title: "Karte des Mahakam-Flusses in Borneo : Nach den aufnahme der Niederländisch-Expedition zur Durchquerung Borneo's, 1896-1897 [cartographic material]"
